Class Vector330

java.lang.Object
Vector330
public class Vector330 extends Object
Vector330Class - provides a 2D vector with associated operations and support
Version:
1.1
Author:
Steven.Hadfield

      public static Vector330 parseVector(Scanner s) throws Exception
      parseVector() - inputs a Scanner object from which it reads and parses a string representing the vector with and expected form of "< 3.0, 4.0 >" - note spaces are needed after '<', after the comma, and before the '>'.
